Reviews.Title: Bundle not worth it
Reviews.Author: Monday
Reviews.Content: The camera is great.  The tripod I would not use with this size and weight of camera.  The 16GB SD card was defective and seller has not responded to my requests for return instructions.  No address was on the shipping box or materials.  Appears to be from an out of business company.  Save money and but items individually.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: randalm
Reviews.Content: This was a value driven purchase. I have used Canon equipment for personal photography for years and this was a great way to update into the digital format for my amateur photographic prints.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 60D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 3.0-Inch LCD - Body (Includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories)
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card
Additional LP-E6 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack
Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag w/Pockets & Strap - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 60D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera (Body) + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
